articles.title: Melania Trump reemerges to highlight responsible AI: ‘The robots are here’
articles.summary: First lady Melania Trump made rare public remarks on Thursday, calling on private and public sector leaders to prepare children for the growth of artificial intelligence, at a Thursday event at the White House.
articles.translated_title: Melania Trump reemerges to highlight responsible AI: ‘The robots are here’
articles.translated_summary: First lady Melania Trump made rare public remarks on Thursday, calling on private and public sector leaders to prepare children for the growth of artificial intelligence, at a Thursday event at the White House.

articles.title: Mark Rylance Joins Cast Of Luca Guadagnino's AI Movie Artificial
articles.summary: Mark Rylance, the Oscar-winning actor for Bridge of Spies, is joining the cast of Luca Guadagnino's Artificial, also starring Andrew Garfield.
articles.translated_title: Mark Rylance Joins Cast Of Luca Guadagnino's AI Movie Artificial
articles.translated_summary: Mark Rylance, the Oscar-winning actor for Bridge of Spies, is joining the cast of Luca Guadagnino's Artificial, also starring Andrew Garfield.

articles.title: Busy brides are saying 'AI do!' with controversial vow generators
articles.summary: Delegating writing duties to artificial intelligence is the ultramodern, controversial way she and approximately 25% of today’s sweeties are saving time, stress and money on their nuptials. And Jen Glantz, founder of Bridesmaid For Hire, a virtual wedding planning hub with over 100 AI tools, is fast-tracking folks into forever with just a few quick clicks.
articles.translated_title: Busy brides are saying 'AI do!' with controversial vow generators

articles.title: AI boom can deliver $100 billion-plus deal, says Barclays banker Woeber
articles.summary: The arms race in artificial intelligence has increased the likelihood of a $100 billion-plus M&A deal by this time next year, according to the top dealmaker at Barclays Plc.
articles.translated_title: AI boom can deliver $100 billion-plus deal, says Barclays banker Woeber
articles.translated_summary: The arms race in artificial intelligence has increased the likelihood of a $100 billion-plus M&A deal by this time next year, according to the top dealmaker at Barclays Plc.

articles.title: Google CEO, major tech leaders join first lady Melania Trump at White House AI meeting
articles.summary: First Lady Melania Trump is hosting an artificial intelligence meeting at the White House Thursday afternoon with top industry leaders including Google CEO Sundar Pichai.
articles.translated_title: Google CEO, major tech leaders join first lady Melania Trump at White House AI meeting
articles.translated_summary: First Lady Melania Trump is hosting an artificial intelligence meeting at the White House Thursday afternoon with top industry leaders including Google CEO Sundar Pichai.

articles.title: Salesforce projects weak sales growth, fueling AI anxiety
articles.summary: Salesforce Inc. projected lackluster quarterly sales growth, suggesting its artificial intelligence product isn't yet paying off as quickly as hoped in the face of competition from emerging AI companies.
articles.translated_title: Salesforce projects weak sales growth, fueling AI anxiety
articles.translated_summary: Salesforce Inc. projected lackluster quarterly sales growth, suggesting its artificial intelligence product isn't yet paying off as quickly as hoped in the face of competition from emerging AI companies.

articles.title: Apple's Siri Overhaul With Google Gemini Will Take The AI Fight To OpenAI And Perplexity
articles.summary: Apple is reportedly in advanced talks to integrate Google’s Gemini artificial intelligence models to power a major upgrade to Siri, Apple's long-standing but recently criticized voice assistant.
articles.translated_title: Apple's Siri Overhaul With Google Gemini Will Take The AI Fight To OpenAI And Perplexity
articles.translated_summary: Apple is reportedly in advanced talks to integrate Google’s Gemini artificial intelligence models to power a major upgrade to Siri, Apple's long-standing but recently criticized voice assistant.

articles.title: C3.ai Stock Sinks as Struggling Firm Replaces CEO, Withdraws Outlook
articles.summary: Shares of C3.ai dipped Thursday, a day after the artificial intelligence software provider replaced its CEO, posted weak results, and withdrew its guidance as it restructured its struggling business.
articles.translated_title: C3.ai Stock Sinks as Struggling Firm Replaces CEO, Withdraws Outlook
articles.translated_summary: Shares of C3.ai dipped Thursday, a day after the artificial intelligence software provider replaced its CEO, posted weak results, and withdrew its guidance as it restructured its struggling business.

articles.title: How mortgage experts are using AI to help Hispanic homeowners
articles.summary: Some mortgage experts are using bilingual artificial intelligence to help buyers in the Hispanic community navigate the homebuying process.
articles.translated_title: How mortgage experts are using AI to help Hispanic homeowners
articles.translated_summary: Some mortgage experts are using bilingual artificial intelligence to help buyers in the Hispanic community navigate the homebuying process.

articles.title: Atlassian to acquire The Browser Company for $610M to bring AI-powered browsing into the enterprise
articles.summary: Atlassian is making a $610 million bet on the future of browsing. The enterprise software giant announced it has agreed to acquire The Browser Company, the New York-based startup behind Arc and Dia, two browsers built with artificial intelligence at their core. The all-cash deal is expected to close in Atlassian’s fiscal second quarter, which
